headline.main: Rick Lamb Wins Web.com Tour's LECOM Health Challenge
headline.print_headline: Rick Lamb Wins Web.com Tour's LECOM Health Challenge

docs.snippet: Monday qualifier Rick Lamb chipped in for birdie on the second hole of a four-man playoff Sunday to win the LECOM Health Challenge for his first Web.com Tour title....
docs.lead_paragraph: Monday qualifier Rick Lamb chipped in for birdie on the second hole of a four-man playoff Sunday to win the LECOM Health Challenge for his first Web.com Tour title.

headline.main: Angels Hit Break in Last Place After 4-2 Loss to Orioles
headline.print_headline: Angels Hit Break in Last Place After 4-2 Loss to Orioles

docs.snippet: After the Los Angeles Angels tacked one more loss to their somber first half of the season, they could take consolation in getting a solid outing from right-hander Tim Lincecum....
docs.lead_paragraph: After the Los Angeles Angels tacked one more loss to their somber first half of the season, they could take consolation in getting a solid outing from right-hander Tim Lincecum.

headline.main: Ronaldo Told Me I'd Score the Winner, Says Portugal's Eder
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Told Me I'd Score the Winner, Says Portugal's Eder

docs.snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo predicted Portugal's Euro 2016 hero Eder would score the winning goal in their 1-0 extra-time triumph over France and gave him the encouragement to settle Sunday's final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo predicted Portugal's Euro 2016 hero Eder would score the winning goal in their 1-0 extra-time triumph over France and gave him the encouragement to settle Sunday's final.

headline.main: France's Poor Finishing Resurfaces at Euro 2016 Final
headline.print_headline: France's Poor Finishing Resurfaces at Euro 2016 Final

docs.snippet: Wasteful finishing came back to haunt France in the European Championship final against Portugal on Sunday, with even tournament top scorer Antoine Griezmann missing his chances....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wasteful finishing came back to haunt France in the European Championship final against Portugal on Sunday, with even tournament top scorer Antoine Griezmann missing his chances.

headline.main: North Korea Threatens 'Physical Response' Against U.S. THAAD System Deployment
headline.print_headline: North Korea Threatens 'Physical Response' Against U.S. THAAD System Deployment

docs.snippet: North Korea's military said on Monday it will make a "physical response" to moves by the United States and South Korea to deploy the advanced THAAD missile defense system on the Korean peninsula....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea's military said on Monday it will make a "physical response" to moves by the United States and South Korea to deploy the advanced THAAD missile defense system on the Korean peninsula.

headline.main: Americans Gather at Demonstrations, Churches and Memorials

docs.snippet: In the aftermath of shootings in Minnesota, Louisiana and Texas, people across the country mourned the victims and protested their deaths....
docs.slideshow_credits: Ilana Panich-Linsman for The New York Times
docs.lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of shootings in Minnesota, Louisiana and Texas, people across the country mourned the victims and protested their deaths.

headline.main: Portugal Breaks Into Jubilation After Euro Soccer Win
headline.print_headline: Portugal Breaks Into Jubilation After Euro Soccer Win

docs.snippet: Portugal erupted into jubilation on Sunday as the country defeated France to win the Euro 2016, its first major international soccer championship....
docs.lead_paragraph: Portugal erupted into jubilation on Sunday as the country defeated France to win the Euro 2016, its first major international soccer championship.

docs.snippet: The Black Lives Matter activist DeRay Mckesson filmed his own arrest in Baton Rouge, La., on Saturday, one of hundreds that took place at demonstrations across the country....

headline.main: Portugal Stuns France to Lift 1st Cup Despite Ronaldo Injury
headline.print_headline: Portugal Stuns France to Lift 1st Cup Despite Ronaldo Injury

docs.snippet: Portugal's players frantically tended to Cristiano Ronaldo's left knee but their tearful captain couldn't withstand the pain any longer....
